basics.name: Andrey
basics.label: 15+ years in software development
summary: Professional .NET/C++ software developer with experience in accomplishing a variety of tasks in a bunch of small and big projects. From developing web api backend of the small enterprise application to creating core modules of the video processing application. From fixing performance issues with a custom RPC implementation to developing Instagram-like social network.
Regardless of the complexity of the project, my goal is to continuously improve the existing solution as well as implement new exciting functionality with high quality.
Besides the work, I m an enthusiastic runner, a completely amateur fisherman, and a chocolate-loving reader.

work.name: SmartExe
work.summary: Development backend for file sharing system. Creating modules for authentication against different identity providers. Working with reverse proxy core module. Fixing performance issues.

work.name: SmartExe
work.summary: Development Engine for building and manage video graph. Capturing video from RTSP translation. Processing and analyzing video data

work.name: SmartExe
work.summary: Development application for capturing video from DeckLink devices. Deal with video processing: recording, rendering

work.name: SmartExe
work.summary: Working with DirectShow SDK. Developing small COM objects for processing images.

projects.name: Skysoft Time Tracking
projects.description: Web application for tracking user's working time spent on different tasks. It also has functionality for managing user's personal data, projects, and demands
highlights: Development API for serving requests from web and mobile applications.

projects.name: True-Pass
projects.description: Application for providing authorized access to an on-premise cloud. Supports various protocols such as RDP, SSH, HTTP

projects.name: Safe-T SDA
projects.description: Reverse proxy-based application for providing secure access to the company intranet

Fixing performance issue with resources access. Application testing.
